title: Engaged Recovery - FlexPay
summary: FlexPay's Engaged Recovery product uses behavioral science to craft empathetic and effective outreach for failed payments. This approach aims to minimize involuntary churn, improve customer satisfaction, and maintain brand experience through personalized, multi-channel communication.
key_points: Utilizes behavioral science for failed payment outreach.
Minimizes involuntary churn and enhances customer satisfaction.
Employs multi-channel communication (SMS, email) for recovery.
Focuses on empathetic and collaborative customer interactions.
Aims to increase response rates and prompt action from customers.
